abstract: Answering questions submitted online, the state environmental commissioner says his staff will look into the idea of requiring "financial assurance"  from drillers to cover liability and contamination from possible drilling accidents.
snippet: Answering questions submitted online, the state environmental commissioner says his staff will look into the idea of requiring "financial assurance"  from drillers to cover liability and contamination from possible drilling accidents.

headline.main: State Did Not Rush on Fracking, Commissioner Says
